CheckTitle: SSL/TLS encryption mode is set to Full (Strict) for end-to-end encryption
Description: Verifies that SSL/TLS encryption mode is set to Full (Strict) to ensure end-to-end encryption with certificate validation between visitors, Cloudflare, and the origin server.
Risk: Without strict SSL mode, traffic between Cloudflare and origin may use unvalidated or unencrypted connections, enabling man-in-the-middle attacks that can intercept sensitive data in transit.

Recommendation.Text: Configure SSL/TLS mode to Full (Strict) and install a valid certificate on your origin server. Use Cloudflare Origin CA certificates for seamless integration and strong encryption throughout.
